mapper.select: SELECT m.market_id marketId, m.member_id memberId, m.title, m.product_name productName, m.price, f.file thumbNailImage, COUNT(f.market_id) hasFile FROM Market m LEFT JOIN MarketFile f ON m.market_id = f.market_id GROUP BY m.market_id ORDER BY m.market_id DESC;
SELECT market_id marketId, member_id memberId, title, content, inserted, price, product_name productName, view_count viewCount, enable FROM Market WHERE market_id = #{market_id}
SELECT market_id marketId, member_id memberId, title, content, inserted, price, product_name productName, total, view_count viewCount, enable FROM Market WHERE market_id = #{market_id}

SELECT m.market_id marketId, m.member_id memberId, m.title, mem.nickname, m.price, m.product_name productName, m.product_code productCode, m.enable, f.file thumbNailImage FROM Market m LEFT JOIN MarketFile f ON m.market_id = f.market_id LEFT JOIN Member mem ON m.member_id = mem.member_id WHERE m.market_id = #{marketId} GROUP BY marketId
mapper.update: UPDATE OrderPay SET order_name= #{orderName}, post_code = #{postCode}, address = #{address}, detail_address = #{detailAddress}, phone = #{phone}, comment =#{comment} WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
